February 1978: Gonza the Lancer

Plays:

Gonza the Lancer (鑓の権三重帷子)

Scenes:

The Hamanomiya Riding Ground (浜の宮馬場)

The House of Ichinoshin Asaka (浅香市之進留守宅)

The Tea Ceremony House (数寄屋)

The Revenge on Kyobashi Bridge in Fushimi (伏見京橋女敵討)

Characters:

Gonza (笹野権三)

Oyuki (娘お雪)

Oyuki's governess (お雪の乳母)

Bannojo (川側伴之丞)

Chutabei (岩木忠太兵衛)

Osai (おさゐ)

Kakusuke, a servant (奴角助)

Torajiro, Osai's son (伜虎次郎)

Okiku, Osai's daughter (娘お菊)

Man, a maid (下女まん)

Osugi, a maid (下女お杉)

Namisuke, a servant (下人(仲間,奴)浪介)

Ichinoshin (浅香市之進)

Osai's mother (おさゐ母 )

Osute (娘お捨)

Jimbei (岩木甚平 )

Dancer (踊り子)

Jinnai, a servant (奴甚内)

Servants (奴)

Retainer (若党)

Servants (仲間)
